document.full_text: in japan, they're all ears for the latest in hi-tech fashion. the stylish headgear, a set of white ears that move according to the wearer's thoughts and emotions, is called "necomimi" -- "cat's ears" in japanese.
document.title: some feline fun with japanese hi-tech headgear
lines_and_colors: in japan, they're all ears for the latest in hi-tech fashion. the stylish headgear, a set of white ears that move according to the wearer's thoughts and emotions, is called "necomimi" -- "cat's ears" in japanese.
